Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can represent a device that allows people to communicate over long distances using sound.
The student can include illustrations of the string telephone device using the provided materials (cups or cans and a string).
The student can show two students using the string telephone to communicate, emphasizing the role of sound.
The student can explain, through a drawing, how sound waves travel through the string to send a message.
The student can depict how the device solves the problem of communicating over a distance without modern technology.
The student can demonstrate that the device has all the required parts to work effectively (two cups/cans connected by a string).
